mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT PROJECT_NUMBER, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_TARGET_AMOUNT, CHANGE_NAME, PROJECT_STATUS, MAKER_NAME, PROJECT_CATEGORY_NAME, SUM(FUNDING_COST+NVL(FUNDING_SPONSERSHIP,0)) as TOTALCOST, CEIL(PROJECT_FINISHDATE-SYSDATE) as DDAY FROM PROJECT JOIN PROJECT_MAKER USING(PROJECT_NUMBER) JOIN CATEGORY_TYPE USING(PROJECT_CATEGORY) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (PROJECT_NUMBER = REF_NO) LEFT JOIN FUNDING_LIST USING(PROJECT_NUMBER) WHERE PROJECT_STATUS='Y' GROUP BY PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_NUMBER, PROJECT_TARGET_AMOUNT, CHANGE_NAME, PROJECT_STATUS, MAKER_NAME, PROJECT_CATEGORY_NAME, CEIL(PROJECT_FINISHDATE-SYSDATE) ORDER BY TOTALCOST DESC NULLS LAST) WHERE ROWNUM <= 9
